name: Undefined
desc: Is not in the database yet.

name: Blood Ritual
desc: Increases Health and Mana granted by Voodoo Ritual by 100%.

name: Annihilating Spirit
desc: Increases the range of the Ravenous Spirit by 50% and Movement Speed by 30%.

name: Dead Rush
desc: Upon expiring, up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

name: Death Ritual
desc: Permanently gain 5 Health and 3 Mana when a Minion dies under Voodoo Ritual.

name: Fresh Corpses
desc: Zombies deal 50% more damage.

name: Gidbinn
desc: Increases the explosion area of Plague Toads and the duration of your Zombie Wall and Corpse Spiders by 25%.

name: Humongoid
desc: Gargantuan lasts until killed instead of timing out, and deals 100% more damage against non-Heroic targets.

name: Infested Toads
desc: Toads explode into Corpse Spiders upon death.

name: Leaping Spiders
desc: Corpse Spiders leap at their targets and deal 25% more damage.

name: Specialized Toxin
desc: Increases the damage dealt to Heroes from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.

name: Spider Cluster
desc: Corpse Spiders creates 3 more spiders over 3 seconds.

name: Toads of Hugeness
desc: Toad damage is increased by 20% each time they hop.

name: Demolitionist
desc: Basic Attacks against Structures destroy 1 ammo and deal an additional 10% damage.

name: Bolt of the Storm
desc: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

name: Gathering Power
desc: Passively grants 5% Ability Power. Each Hero takedown increases this bonus by 2% to a maximum of 15% . This bonus Ability Power is reset to 5% on death.

name: Envenom
desc: Activate to poison an enemy Hero, dealing #0 damage over #1 seconds.

name: Promote
desc: Activate to cause an allied lane Minion to take 75% reduced damage from non-Heroic targets and deal 100% bonus damage to non-Heroic targets for 30 seconds. Has 2 charges.

name: Mercenary Lord
desc: Siege and Bruiser Mercenaries near your hero deal 50% more damage.

name: Clairvoyance
desc: Activate to reveal an area for 10 seconds. Enemies in the area are revealed for 4 seconds.

name: Calldown: MULE
desc: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second. Grants 1 ammo every 3 seconds.

name: Sprint
desc: Activate to gain 75% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

name: Ice Block
desc: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

name: Stoneskin
desc: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.

name: Fury of the Storm
desc: Every #0 seconds, your next basic attack will deal an additional #1 damage to the target, and #2 damage to all nearby Minions and Mercenaries.

name: Bribe
desc: Kill enemy Minions to gain stacks of Bribe. Use 20 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses.
